verses.verse: But it came to pass <WH1961> within a while <WH4480> <WH3117> after, in the time <WH3117> of wheat <WH2406> harvest, <WH7105> that Samson <WH8123> visited <WH6485> <WH853> his wife <WH802> with a kid; <WH1423> <WH5795> and he said, <WH559> I will go in <WH935> to <WH413> my wife <WH802> into the chamber. <WH2315> But her father <WH1> would not <WH3808> suffer <WH5414> him to go in. <WH935>

And her father <WH1> said, <WH559> I verily thought <WH559> <WH559> that <WH3588> thou hadst utterly hated <WH8130> <WH8130> her; therefore I gave <WH5414> her to thy companion: <WH4828> is not <WH3808> her younger <WH6996> sister <WH269> fairer <WH2896> than <WH4480> she? take <WH1961> her, I pray thee, <WH4994> instead <WH8478> of her.

And Samson <WH8123> said <WH559> concerning them, Now <WH6471> shall I be more blameless <WH5352> than the Philistines, <WH4480> <WH6430> though <WH3588> I <WH589> do <WH6213> <WH5973> them a displeasure. <WH7451>

And Samson <WH8123> went <WH1980> and caught <WH3920> three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> foxes, <WH7776> and took <WH3947> firebrands, <WH3940> and turned <WH6437> tail <WH2180> to <WH413> tail, <WH2180> and put <WH7760> a <WH259> firebrand <WH3940> in the midst <WH8432> between <WH996> two <WH8147> tails. <WH2180>

And when he had set <WH1197> the brands <WH3940> on fire, <WH784> he let them go <WH7971> into the standing corn <WH7054> of the Philistines, <WH6430> and burnt up <WH1197> both the shocks, <WH4480> <WH1430> and also <WH5704> the standing corn, <WH7054> with <WH5704> the vineyards <WH3754> and olives. <WH2132>

Then the Philistines <WH6430> said, <WH559> Who <WH4310> hath done <WH6213> this? <WH2063> And they answered, <WH559> Samson, <WH8123> the son-in-law <WH2860> of the Timnite, <WH8554> because <WH3588> he had taken <WH3947> <WH853> his wife, <WH802> and given <WH5414> her to his companion. <WH4828> And the Philistines <WH6430> came up, <WH5927> and burnt <WH8313> her and her father <WH1> with fire. <WH784>
And Samson <WH8123> said <WH559> unto them, Though <WH518> ye have done <WH6213> this, <WH2063> yet <WH3588> <WH518> will I be avenged <WH5358> of you, and after that <WH310> I will cease. <WH2308>

And he smote <WH5221> them hip <WH7785> and <WH5921> thigh <WH3409> with a great <WH1419> slaughter: <WH4347> and he went down <WH3381> and dwelt <WH3427> in the top <WH5585> of the rock <WH5553> Etam. <WH5862>
Then the Philistines <WH6430> went up, <WH5927> and pitched <WH2583> in Judah, <WH3063> and spread themselves <WH5203> in Lehi. <WH3896>

And the men <WH376> of Judah <WH3063> said, <WH559> Why <WH4100> are ye come up <WH5927> against <WH5921> us? And they answered, <WH559> To bind <WH631> <WH853> Samson <WH8123> are we come up, <WH5927> to do <WH6213> to him as <WH834> he hath done <WH6213> to us.

Then three <WH7969> thousand <WH505> men <WH376> of Judah <WH4480> <WH3063> went <WH3381> to <WH413> the top <WH5585> of the rock <WH5553> Etam, <WH5862> and said <WH559> to Samson, <WH8123> Knowest <WH3045> thou not <WH3808> that <WH3588> the Philistines <WH6430> are rulers <WH4910> over us? what <WH4100> is this <WH2063> that thou hast done <WH6213> unto us? And he said <WH559> unto them, As <WH834> they did <WH6213> unto me, so <WH3651> have I done <WH6213> unto them.

And they said <WH559> unto him, We are come down <WH3381> to bind <WH631> thee, that we may deliver <WH5414> thee into the hand <WH3027> of the Philistines. <WH6430> And Samson <WH8123> said <WH559> unto them, Swear <WH7650> unto me, that <WH6435> ye will not fall <WH6293> upon me yourselves. <WH859>

And they spoke <WH559> unto him, saying, <WH559> No; <WH3808> but <WH3588> we will bind thee fast, <WH631> <WH631> and deliver <WH5414> thee into their hand: <WH3027> but surely we will not kill <WH4191> <WH3808> <WH4191> thee. And they bound <WH631> him with two <WH8147> new <WH2319> cords, <WH5688> and brought him up <WH5927> from <WH4480> the rock. <WH5553>

And when he <WH1931> came <WH935> unto <WH5704> Lehi, <WH3896> the Philistines <WH6430> shouted <WH7321> against <WH7125> him: and the Spirit <WH7307> of the LORD <WH3068> came mightily <WH6743> upon <WH5921> him, and the cords <WH5688> that <WH834> were upon <WH5921> his arms <WH2220> became <WH1961> as flax <WH6593> that <WH834> was burnt <WH1197> with fire, <WH784> and his bands <WH612> loosed <WH4549> from off <WH4480> <WH5921> his hands. <WH3027>
And he found <WH4672> a new <WH2961> jawbone <WH3895> of an ass, <WH2543> and put forth <WH7971> his hand, <WH3027> and took <WH3947> it, and slew <WH5221> a thousand <WH505> men <WH376> therewith.

And Samson <WH8123> said, <WH559> With the jawbone <WH3895> of an ass, <WH2543> heaps upon heaps, <WH2565> <WH2565> with the jaw <WH3895> of an ass <WH2543> have I slain <WH5221> a thousand <WH505> men. <WH376>

And it came to pass, <WH1961> when he had made an end <WH3615> of speaking, <WH1696> that he cast away <WH7993> the jawbone <WH3895> out of his hand, <WH4480> <WH3027> and called <WH7121> that <WH1931> place <WH4725> Ramath-lehi. <WH7437>

And he was sore athirst, <WH6770> <WH3966> and called <WH7121> on <WH413> the LORD, <WH3068> and said, <WH559> Thou <WH859> hast given <WH5414> <WH853> this <WH2063> great <WH1419> deliverance <WH8668> into the hand <WH3027> of thy servant: <WH5650> and now <WH6258> shall I die <WH4191> for thirst, <WH6772> and fall <WH5307> into the hand <WH3027> of the uncircumcised? <WH6189>

But God <WH430> cleaved <WH1234> <WH853> a hollow place <WH4388> that <WH834> was in the jaw, <WH3895> and there came <WH3318> water <WH4325> therefrom; <WH4480> and when he had drunk, <WH8354> his spirit <WH7307> came again, <WH7725> and he revived: <WH2421> wherefore <WH5921> <WH3651> he called <WH7121> the name <WH8034> thereof En-hakkore, <WH5875> which <WH834> is in Lehi <WH3896> unto <WH5704> this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>
And he judged <WH8199> <WH853> Israel <WH3478> in the days <WH3117> of the Philistines <WH6430> twenty <WH6242> years. <WH8141>
